title: Hong Kong to Sign MOU With Shanghai Gold Exchange, Chan Says
description: Hong Kong will sign a memorandum of understanding with the Shanghai Gold Exchange at the upcoming Asian Financial Forum, according to the city’s Financial Secretary Paul Chan.
content: Hong Kong will sign a memorandum of understanding with the Shanghai Gold Exchange at the upcoming Asian Financial Forum, according to the city’s Financial Secretary Paul Chan.
